attributes.description:
The Sandero Stepway is a solid, practical and fashionable ‘pumped up’ hatchback that makes a strong case for itself.For a relatively low price you get a decent-sized hatchback with an SUV-inspired design package and more safety kit than most of its rivals offer. No one’s pretending that this is some kind of bundu basher , but the Stepway does at least strike the right chord with buyers seeking a bit of SUV flavour at the lower Budget .

attributes.description:
When the Nissan Qashqai debuted in 2007 it caused a bit of a stir. "Is it an SUV? Is it an overweight hatchback? What do we call it?" we joked. Its strange name quickly became the default braai time 'one liner'; "Have you heard about the new Nissan CASHCOW?" Cue sniggling and generally juvenile 'LOLs'.

Ironically, the joke is on us and other manufacturers, though, because not only did Nissan introduce us to a market segment which would effectively spark a 'War of the Worlds' between manufacturers, the Qashqai has actually become somewhat of cash cow for Nissan, who have managed to sell more than two million since its 2007 debut. Why, you might ask? Because, simply, it is very good Crossover.
*Full documented service history and spare keys.
*We do finance through all major banks with same day approval. 
*Road worthy and Safety Checks done.
*We also accept trade ins
*We Buy low mileage, late model vehicles!
*2 year Mechanical Breakdown warranties Available.
*Test drives offered based on Approvals/Deposits.
* Price Excludes On the Road Cost and Licencing & Registration (R5500)Optional Extra
* Nationwide Delivery T's & C's Apply

attributes.description:
Back when it was launched in 2013, the EcoSport was quite the revelation. Ford took what we knew and loved about hatchbacks and applied them to a raised body baby SUV. As South Africa's small crossover craze gained momentum, the EcoSport soared… sometimes, as many as 1 000 units were sold a month. It's also critical to note that there were few competitors back then, making Ford one of the early trendsetters in this (now) ultra-competitive segment
*Full documented service history and spare keys.

attributes.description:
The ML is a dynamic expression of power, defined by its smooth surfaces and muscular lines. Every function, every detail is designed to offer you the greatest freedom and comfort. Funnell Cars are proud to Introduce to you the 2014 Mercedes-Benz ML350d BlueTec magic beautifully finished in the signature Selenite Gray Metallic. Venturing a total of 140 000km’s. This GLE 350d has been expertly maintained to exceptional standards. Included on this exceptional ML is Alloy wheels, PDC, , Leather seats, Multi function steering wheel, Cruise control, Air con, Air bags, Electric windows and mirrors, Daytime running lights, Sun roof, Radio CD, Reverse camera, & much more! Our dealership is here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery. We are affiliated with all major financial institutions for your convenience and our dedicated team demonstrates great knowledge and experience in the motor industry. To request a personalised presentation, arrange a test drive or to simply ask for additional info simply give us a call.

Trade-ins accepted.
Delivery Country wide.
Finance available with all major banks.
13 Payne Street, Pinetown, KZN.
